Original javadoc is not so useful:

timeline.bodyText:
Looks like the use different code formatting
Could you please check https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/IGNITE/Coding+Guidelines especially
Whitespaces and empty lines chapter
Source code line should not be longer then 120 characters (to be visible on most conventional monitors). 4 space characters should be used for tabulation and indentation

timeline.bodyText: Could you please explain, why did you use NamedVector with CatBoost models
